title: Can't Open chat
body: When playing in Borderless and having Chrome in background listening to music, hitting ENTER or Shift+ENTER doesn't open my chat, I don't wanna play without borderless, because I stream and I need my music aswell, it happened like 2 weeks ago, before I've never had this problem.

replies.body:
While you're in borderless, something might be shifting the focus window so that when you hit enter it's sending the keypress to chrome instead of League. Try making sure you click on League before you hit enter to see if that would work correctly, but if not let's try resetting your config files in case something is messed up in there.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
- Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
